column5: Does anyone know where I can have custom Tournament shirts made up?
Check this place out.  tourneyshirts.com  Hope this helps  L.
D-Zigns have some decent pricing. Usually very pricy doing 1-2's  http://tournament-shirts.d-zignsinc.com/  I spent some time looking around a few years ago and found nothing in Canada
Try these guys  EmbroidME 4585 wy #7 Woodbridge, Ontario  905 265.0210  www.embroidme-woodbridge.com  e-mail  [emailÂ protected]
I have used Tom at tourneyshirts.com  He does a great job and has done many BASS pro shirts
If you are looking for the Dye sublimated shirts check out Gemini Sport Marketing.  I get all my XDS shirts from them...they have a great online gallery.  -sheldon
Thanks for all the reply's everyone. I will check them all out!
Real men don't wear Tourney Shirts..
Just because they dont make them in your size, doesnt mean you should insult others!
